name: df-mntop
body: |- wceq(cmntop, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), c2ndc), wcel(cv(s1), cha), wcel(cv(s1), clly(cec(cfv(ctopn, cfv(cehl, cv(s0))), chmph)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ManTop = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧(s1 ∈ 2ndc ∧ s1 ∈ Haus ∧ s1 ∈ Locally([(TopOpen `(EEhil ` s0))]~=)))}
comment: Define the class of N-manifold topologies, as 2nd countable, Hausdorff topologies, locally homeomorphic to a ball of the Euclidean space of dimension N. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Dec-2019.)
